summary: A simple mod that allows you to choose from one of the 11 arrow and quiver sets (Daedric, Draugr, Dwarven, Ebony, Elven, Falmer, Forsworn, Glass, Iron, Orcish and Steel) to replace all of the arrows and quivers in the game (purely aesthetical, the arrows keep their stats, names, etc.)
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/mcslmHJ.png[/IMG]
I have never been fond of some of the overly fancy arrow and quiver sets in Skyrim, and always preferred the simple look of Steel arrows and quiver, but their damage sucks. Hence 'Arrow and Quiver Replacer', it allows you to choose from one of the 11 arrow and quiver sets (Daedric, Draugr, Dwarven, Ebony, Elven, Falmer, Forsworn, Glass, Iron, Orcish and Steel) to replace all of the arrows and quivers in the game, though purely aesthetically; the replaced arrows keep all of their stats, so you can use Glass arrows but with the simple look of Steel. Or Falmer arrows with the appearance of Daedric arrows. Or any other number of options!

Please note: I forgot to disable belt fastened quivers in the pictures, this mod doesn't do that, it simply allows you to replace the quivers with one of your choice.


[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/sz2IvKv.png[/IMG]
- Only Skyrim
- Dawnguard version to include Dragonbone arrows soon!

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/L3HtzxN.png[/IMG]
[b]Version 1.0.1[/b]
- Fixed a small bug where fired arrows use their original model (ie, if you replaced all arrows with Daedric ones, and fired a steel arrow, the arrow on the ground would look like the original steel arrow and not Daedric)
[b]Version 1.0.0[/b]
- Initial release


[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/f55YAtC.png[/IMG]
Either:

- Use NMM. Comes with fully scripted NMM Installer - [b]RECOMMENDED[/b]

- Manual install:

1. Choose the arrow and quiver you want to use

2. Drag and drop the respective folder into SkyrimData


[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/dm10Jzu.png[/IMG]

- NMM Install - Simply deactivate the mod

- Manual Install - Remove all the meshes you installed during the installation
author: Jordan
